About Me

Allow me to introduce myself...

Thank you for spending your time to check it out

My full name is Masaki Jesse Taoka Hook. I am a Bachelor's of Computer Science Graduate from UCF (University of Central Florida). Although I have a relative degree, I have self studied in Front-End Web development concepts, such as CSS/HTML web languages, JavaScript programming languages, React.js/Bootstrap frameworks and libralies and more. Having a baseball background of 20 years, it helps me to keep motivated, practice my skills efficiently to improve myself in tech, and I am determined to deliver advanced and efficient products to the team and clients. Blessed to be able to speak Japanese and English fluetly as bonus.

"Bad practice makes you worse. Perfect practice makes you better but not perfect. So you must keep up the perfect practice."

Achievement One

Dean's List

During first 2 years of University life, played baseball and maintained above 3.5 GPA to aquired Dean's List for 2 years. Achieved to be Academic All American Athlete of the year which led to be in JUCO All Star Team of the Division in 2013.

Achievement Two

Bachelor's of Computer Science

Graduated University of Central Florida with Bachelor's of Computer Science. Also, participated in National Society of Leadership group during last 2 years in university.

Award Three

Walt Disney World

Working in the "Most Magical Place" on earth was a very humble experience. For working in a magical environment for over 9 years, I have gained the most demanded skills in any jobs.
